mapper.select: select p.proj_title, p.proj_estimate, p.proj_reqr_person, p.proj_work_place, p.proj_reqr_skill, p.proj_start_date from project p, apply a where p.proj_id = a.proj_id
select p.member_no, p.career, p.skill from partners p, followpartners f where p.member_no = f.target_member and rownum <= 5 order by f.FOLLOWING_DATE desc
